arts.ttl: 'Absolutely pathetic' - Rangers hit for six by Club Brugge in play-off humiliation
arts.sum: Russell Martin’s tough start to life as Rangers head coach plumbed new depths after his side were embarrassingly dispatched 6-0 by Club Brugge in the second leg of their Champions League play-off tie.

arts.ttl: 'Humiliating!' Rangers out of Champions League after six-goal defeat by Club Brugge
arts.sum: Russell Martin's Rangers side suffer "one of the most embarrassing nights in their European history" as they are demolished 6-0 by Club Brugge after going down to 10 men to lose 9-1 on aggregate in the Champions League play-offs.
